item.title: Ben Folds Five - Jackson Cannery
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 61870

Stop the bus
I wanna be lonely
When seconds
pass slowly
And years go
flying by
You gotta stop the bus
I’ll get off here
Enough’s enough
I’m leaving
This factory
now all she wants
Is food on the table
I won’t be able
To bring it home
now all she wants
Come on
cause all I need
Is free
cause I’m a factory
Did mother nature
tell you boy
You come and go
as you please
That’s what
she said to me
Big brother’s
got the keys
I got Jackson Cannery
Wow wow wow wow
Millionaires and
millrats live
Side by side
messed up
My brother’s mind
he’s far from earth
Tell me
what’s he worth
The same as you
same as me
In this factory
did Mother
Nature tell you
boy you come and go
As you please
that’s what
She said to me
big brother’s
Got the keys
I got Jackson Cannery
Wow come on wow
wow wow
It’s 4 in the morning
mother don’t know
That I’m going
far away
She’s whispering
to the moon
I hope he don’t
join you soon
Baby boss climbs up
on his soapbox
But Great Caesar’s
ghost Knows
What’s best for me
he says stop the bus
Did mother nature
tell you Boy
You come and go
as you please
That’s what
she said to me

got the keys
I got
Jackson Cannery
